content.raw:
Thanks for helping with this.

> I didn't enforce py2.7+ anywhere because there are a variety of ways to do that and I'm sure Michael has a favorite way

This should be enforced in `setup.py`.

> 2to3 also changed a variety of interface details (iteritems to items, xrange to range etc)

Can we not do this for now? 2.7 `iteritems` = 3.5 `items` but 2.7 `iteritems` != 2.7 `items`.

> - added sizes command to genomedata-info

Can you please make this a separate pull request? If this is just Py3 readiness it should be separate from a new feature.

Also please add `NEWS` describing changes (with your name).

After you respond to these items, @ericr86 will do a line-by-line review and then I will.

Regarding the command-line interface I would rather not change it for now because it would break old scripts. It would require a new minor release at least and a separate discussion.

Thanks!
Michael
